definition: the iron normally used on the putting green, move around aimlessly
details:
noun
- the iron normally used on the putting green
= synonyms: putting iron
- a golfer who is putting
verb
- move around aimlessly
= synonyms: potter, potter around, putter around
- do random, unplanned work or activities or spend time idly
= synonyms: monkey
- work lightly
= synonyms: potter
